sentence.text: Altogether, our study provides direct evidence that endogenous positive regulation of Wnt signaling pathway and Rspo3 chromosome rearrangements can initiate and maintain tumour development, and indicate a viable therapeutic window for LGK974 treatment of RSPO-fusion cancers

entity.text: positive regulation of Wnt signaling pathway

sentence.text: We show that both Rspo2 and positive regulation of Wnt signaling pathway fusion events are sufficient to initiate hyperplasia and tumour development in vivo, without additional cooperating genetic events.

entity.text: positive regulation of Wnt signaling pathway

sentence.text: Here, we describe the generation of transgenic, inducible CRISPR-based mouse systems to engineer and study recurrent colon cancer-associated EIF3E-RSPO2 and protein dephosphorylation-RSPO3 chromosome rearrangements in vivo.
